_comment: Rule MCP Server - Docker Environment Configuration Template
_instructions: 1. This configuration is for Docker environment
2. Replace ${PROJECT_PATH} with the full path to your RuleMCPServer directory
3. The RULE_SERVER_URL points to Docker host port 18080
4. Replace ${MCP_API_KEY} with your API key (optional, leave empty for public access)
5. Remove these comment lines before using

rule-mcp-server.description: Standard MCP Server for Rule Management (Docker Environment) - provides coding rules and validation tools for AI agents
